scene.name: intro
scene.line: How's it looking, Ted? Get that new fan installed?
Ted met one of our engineers at a bar some years ago, and they just `clicked`.
Our engineer told him about some trouble with the equipment here, and he felt compelled to take a crack at it.
Ted's been obsessively tuning, replacing, and upgrading ever since. Quite a project, Ted! You'll get ahead of it one day, I'm sure.
